M

main - package main
Game and related classes are located in this package
main(String[]) - Static method in class main.Main
starts the game
Main - Class in main
Holds main method which starts the Game
Main() - Constructor for class main.Main
 
maxHP - Variable in class util.SaveData
player's info which needs to be saved
MEDIPACK - Enum constant in enum class entities.Item.ItemType
 
MEDIPACK - Static variable in class util.AssetManager
 
medipac - Static variable in class util.SoundManager
 
MedPacSound() - Static method in class util.SoundManager
start medpac sound from 0 position
menu - Static variable in class util.SoundManager
 
Menu - Class in states
Initial state which has buttons for entering the game and settings or exiting the game
Menu(Game) - Constructor for class states.Menu
Inits the menu buttons
Menu() - Static method in class util.SoundManager
Call the MenuSound method when the menu opens
MENU - Enum constant in enum class states.GameState
 
MENU_BG - Static variable in class util.AssetManager
 
MenuButton - Class in ui
Buttons which are located only in the Menu state
MenuButton(Rectangle, String) - Constructor for class ui.MenuButton
 
MenuSound() - Static method in class util.SoundManager
Start menu, set start position to 0 and looping
MenuSoundClose() - Static method in class util.SoundManager
stops the menu

mouseEntered(MouseEvent) - Method in class listeners.MouseListener
